string-array.name: noticelist_detail
string-array.item: As soon as the initiation stage got over, the masterminds became active and started working. They put their sleeves up, gathered their tools and started fitting the pieces together. Gathering study materials, finding roommates, asking questions, knowing teachers – they left no stones unturned in building the virtual forms of colleges from ground up.

As soon as the initiation stage got over, the masterminds became active and started working. They put their sleeves up, gathered their tools and started fitting the pieces together. Gathering study materials, finding roommates, asking questions, knowing teachers – they left no stones unturned in building the virtual forms of colleges from ground up.
